  • 13 Mar 2013 » Where do bikes take us together?

    Back in December, the Hubway Data Challenge released data on Boston’s Hubway bikeshare and asked people to do interesting stuff with it. The winning entries explored how much time Hubway saved Bostonians, how bikes flowed through the Hubway system, and how Boston’s relationship with Hubway evolved over half a million trips.
